channel.title: Favorite Albums [Heavy Metal]
channel.description:
if you're into metal, you should take the time out to listen to these great albums. If you want you can post your own metal albums that you want others to listen too!
no metalcore/deathcore

item.title: Favorite Albums [Heavy Metal]
item.dc:creator: @Sfacciato Sfacciato
item.description:
@Sfacciato wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:6, topic:533905”]i love electric wizard!!! doom is the shit

you should check out reverend bizarre and bongripper too if you like doom :)[/quote]

Bongripper - Reefer Sutherland is the shit, man. I was actually going to put it with that post but decided not to. Great track.

Never heard of reverend bizarre though, so I’ll definitely check em out.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Albums [Heavy Metal]
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Soulcist:

Mine is The Sound of Perseverance.

YES.

Also the Iron album from Ensiferum is amazing.

As well as Serpents of the Light from Deicide.

Lai Lai Hei is a masterpiece.

item.title: Favorite Albums [Heavy Metal]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So no core but thrash metal is okay? Seems a bit one sided but w/e.
Here are some of my favorites (They’re classed as heavy metal on more than one site.)
Black Sabbath - Master of Reality
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xRKGKXL1seE[/youtube]

Dokken - Tooth and Nail (1984)
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UslB-c-PMHU[/youtube]

Exodus - Temple of the Damned
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RAxlWxsVtMc[/youtube]

I honestly cannot believe this isn’t on here:
Iron Maiden - The Number of the Beast
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EoXuACtVSZ8[/youtube]

Read full topic
